metadata.title: CVE-2025-0509 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium

criterions.comment: openjdk-8 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-lts package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-17').
openjdk-16: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-17').
openjdk-17 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-21 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
